props.everyItem: Indicates if all items in table are selected.
props.headers: Array of header items to display.
props.header-props: Pass props to the default header.
props.options: Options object. Identical to the one on `v-data-table`.
props.someItems: Indicates if one or more items in table are selected.
props.sortByText: Sets the label text used by the default sort-by selector when `v-data-table` is rendering the mobile view.

slots.[`header.${string}`]: Slot for a specific header. See [`v-data-table-headers` API](/api/v-data-table-headers) for more information.
slots.header.data-table-expand: Slot for the expand button in the header.
slots.header.data-table-select: Slot for the select-all checkbox in the header.
slots.headers: Array of header items to display.
